In England, in the seven days to 23 March, there were 31,513 new confirmed cases (56.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 March, there were 32,295 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (782 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 March is 3,789,899 (6,733.2 cases per 100,000 population).
